text: Love Is War may refer to: * Love Is War (album), a 2006 album by Vanilla Ninja * Love Is War (1970 film), a 1970 Norwegian film * Love Is War (2019 film), a Nigerian film * "Love Is War", a 2010 song by Joe McElderry from Wide Awake * "Love Is War", a 2013 song by American Young * Kaguya-sama: Love Is War, a Japanese manga and anime series == See also == * In Love and War (disambiguation) * Love and War (disambiguation) * War is peace
title: Love Is War
